Articles.Content:
Halco is proud to bring you.... the Super Cezna!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

It's quite fun to fly, it handles like a real cezna or however you spell it.

less than 50 parts.

Plenty of fuel.

Download: https://www./?x6y497hnqw8k8wj

EDIT:

Be sure to open & close the cargo bay up front before taking off, it's a bug in 1.0 that will crash your plane if you dont do this.

Edited April 30, 2015 by Kozak
You sir have the reward and recognition of your peers for posting the first Spacecraft Exchange craft certified for KSP 1.0. Congrats! Have some rep!

You sir have the reward and recognition of your peers for posting the first Spacecraft Exchange craft certified for KSP 1.0. Congrats! Have some rep!

Yay! Danke, mediafire and ksp are wigging out at the same time, download will be up in a min or two hopefully!
